name: CAMELCOPTER
description:
Camel Copter is going on an adventure to look into the endless Mega cave.

The light in the end of the tunnel isn't coming, you have to count on your only torch, your camel copter has limited power, the torch is in it's full capacity only when you go up.

Please comment and let me know what you think and what is the difficulty of this game.

CONTROLS:

CLICK/SPACEBAR - UP+TORCH.

ESC - Quit the game.

ART: Saar Ben Horin

Programming: Saar Ben Horin

FreeSound:  zixem | kernschall | daniel-ms

Special thanks to Mati & Itamar Ernst for their advice :>

Mac build coming soon.
